description: The Department of Infrastructure has published a 15-year "road map" for the Isle of Man's capital.
title: New bridge and cycle lanes to 'improve access' in Douglas
title_page: New bridge and cycle lanes to 'improve access' in Douglas - BBC News
maintext: Among proposals is the inclusion of segregated cycle lanes on two routes into Douglas, which would alleviate the expected congestion as more homes are built under the government's area plan for the east.
